content: **knitted jumper with raglan in drops babymerino piece is knitted top down with textured pattern and ¾ sleeves size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no bm-074 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl note measurements on chart is given in knitting gauge in stocking stitch applies to body because of the pattern the garment will be very elastic and will contract approx 9 to 14 cm in body width when garment is flat work the size you normally would **materials** drops babymerino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 300-350-350-400-450-500 g colour 43 light sea green **knitting gauge ** 24 stitches in width and 32 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm 30 stitches textured pattern a 1 measures approx 10 cm when piece is flat and contracted needles drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm for textured pattern drops double pointed needles size 2 mm drops circular needle size 2 mm length 40 and 80 cm for rib needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size
